meanings.definition: Having a stronger odor than a skunk.
meanings.sent1: The garbage in the summer heat was even skunkier than usual.
meanings.sent2: The skunkier smell of the new perfume lingered in the room.
meanings.sent3: The skunkier cheese made everyone scrunch up their noses in disgust.
meanings.sent4: The skunkier stench filled the air, overpowering all other scents.
meanings.sent5: The skunkier aroma wafted from the flower, attracting insects from afar.
